chunk_text:
#### What items are allowed on the lawns? No. WHV is a tobacco free, non-smoking property. We do offer a
pre-designated smoking area to be arranged prior to the event. There is absolutely no vaping or marijuana use allowed at any time. #### Is smoking allowed? Yes. There are ADA restroom facilities in the chapel and in a building by the lawn area. Also, full restrooms are provided in all of the bridal suites for members of the bridal party.
